revised_title: William Rushton: A Pioneering Figure in Vision Research
tldr: This article is a biographical memoir of William Rushton, a prominent figure in vision research. It highlights his significant contributions to the field, including his work on peripheral nerve excitability and his influential research on vision. Rushton's unique approach to problem-solving and his ability to identify critical arguments and experiments made him a dominant figure in a rapidly advancing field. His impact on the scientific community is remembered through his numerous publications and the influence he had on his students and colleagues.
